The platform does not control token price fluctuations, external exchanges, or third-party wallet services. Users are responsible for managing their assets securely, and Koi assumes no liability for lost, stolen, or devalued tokens due to market conditions or user negligence. Players engaging in cheating, game exploitation, or unauthorized manipulation of platform mechanics will face account suspension and forfeiture of funds.
